Text.Page:
destroyed the Storm Barrier Regulator and returned to Highwatch with Paesyn, Rhodos, and Halran just before the lab collapsed.
Hagand speculated that all the conditions for reactivating the teleportal had been met, and invited to do the honors. With a new relativity stone in place, the mechanism worked, projecting a strong ray of light to the sky. The teleportal appeared, and moments later, the federation reinforcements arrived from Velika.

Zolyn is gone?

Don't worry: We'll find her, and bring her back safely.

But we need to get the teleportal working. Things have gone from bad to worse on the battlefield, and we need reinforcements.

Hagand will explain what needs to be done."Okay, I'll talk to him."

Welcome back, .

I have been informed of your loss, and you have my promise that Highwatch will do everything it can to help you find Zolyn.

The immediate concern, though, is the teleportal. I believe that all of the conditions are right for reactivating it—and I wanted you to have the honor.

My friend, please place a Relativity Stone in the repository, and re-open Highwatch's teleportal!"It would be my honor. Thank you."

Who opened this teleportal? ?

I knew from the moment I saw you that you were destined for great things—but you continue to exceed my expectations!

I could not resist seeing the baraka homeland for myself, but I must return to Velika.
There's still a war going on at the frontline, but with Highwatch, we now have the wisest on our side.

Please assist Dougal in securing the area. With you both here, I have every confidence that this war is all but won!"Yes, sir. Thank you, sir."

! A word, if I may?

First, I wish to thank you for your efforts. Thanks to you, Highwatch has a chance again.

But we are only just beginning this new phase of the war...and you are fated to play an even more important role. Mystel herself has ordained it."There is much still left to do, yes."
